How can I move from arrivals to departures side without exiting the Airport?A transfer gate is located between the Arrival Hall and the Departure area (the entrance next to the Arrival lounge exit). When did operations commence from T2 at Kempegowda International Airport Bengaluru?Domestic operations from T2 commenced on January 15, 2023. Currently AirAsia India, Star Air and Vistara operate their domestic flights from T2. From 10:45 am on August 31, 2023, all scheduled International arrivals and departures will be from T2. Air India domestic flights will operate from T2 effective August 31, 2023, 00:01am.\nFor a more convenient experience, you may also download the <a href='https://onelink.to/xzqgtn'>BLR Pulse App</a>.\n If you require any further assistance, please reach out to our customer care at <a href='mailto:feedback@bialairport.com'>feedback@bialairport.com</a> or call <a href='tel:08066785555'>080-66785555</a> / <a href='tel:08047406666'>080-47406666</a>.https://storage.corover.ai/chatbot-audio-bucket-aws/e6b023e7-6ccf-42cf-b5f4-d409adca38f5_en.mp3

Internet & Wi-Fi for domesticAvail free Wi-Fi service (upto 2 hours) at BLR Airport with a simple log-in process.<ol><li>Enable Wi-Fi and select BLR Airport free Wi-Fi.</li><li>Open a web browser on your device and type any URL. You will be redirected to the Wi-Fi webpage.</li><li>Fill in the required details and click on 'send OTP'</li><li>Enter the OTP received and click on 'submit'.</li><li>Enjoy free internet for 2 hours. Do not close the login page during this duration.</li>\nIf you are a registered user on pulse, then being a loyalty user you will be eligible for extended Wi-Fi.\nFor non pulse users, the Wi-Fi disables in an hour.
\nFor a more convenient experience, you may also download the <a href='
https://onelink.to/xzqgtn'>BLR
Pulse App</a>.\n If you require any further assistance, please reach out to our customer care at <a href='mailto:feedback@bialairport.com'>feedback@bialairport.com</a> or call <a href='tel:08066785555'>080-66785555</a> / <a href='tel:08047406666'>080-47406666</a>.		https://coroverbackendstorage.blob.core.windows.net/chatbot-audio-bucket/c121c44c-8ac9-4d54-bcd4-54069b15e7c2_en.mp3
WiFi & Internet for home useAvail free Wi-Fi service (upto 2 hours) at BLR Airport with a simple log-in process.<ol><li>Enable Wi-Fi and select BLR Airport free Wi-Fi.</li><li>Open a web browser on your device and type any URL. You will be redirected to the Wi-Fi webpage.</li><li>Fill in the required details and click on 'send OTP'</li><li>Enter the OTP received and click on 'submit'.</li><li>Enjoy free internet for 2 hours. Do not close the login page during this duration.</li>\nIf you are a registered user on pulse, then being a loyalty user you will be eligible for extended Wi-Fi.\nFor non pulse users, the Wi-Fi disables in an hour.
\nFor a more convenient experience, you may also download the <a href='
https://onelink.to/xzqgtn'>BLR
Pulse App</a>.\n If you require any further assistance, please reach out to our customer care at <a href='mailto:feedback@bialairport.com'>feedback@bialairport.com</a> or call <a href='tel:08066785555'>080-66785555</a> / <a href='tel:08047406666'>080-47406666</a>.		https://coroverbackendstorage.blob.core.windows.net/chatbot-audio-bucket/c121c44c-8ac9-4d54-bcd4-54069b15e7c2_en.mp3
Wi-Fi and Internet access for homeAvail free Wi-Fi service (upto 2 hours) at BLR Airport with a simple log-in process.<ol><li>Enable Wi-Fi and select BLR Airport free Wi-Fi.</li><li>Open a web browser on your device and type any URL. You will be redirected to the Wi-Fi webpage.</li><li>Fill in the required details and click on 'send OTP'</li><li>Enter the OTP received and click on 'submit'.</li><li>Enjoy free internet for 2 hours. Do not close the login page during this duration.</li>\nIf you are a registered user on pulse, then being a loyalty user you will be eligible for extended Wi-Fi.\nFor non pulse users, the Wi-Fi disables in an hour.
\nFor a more convenient experience, you may also download the <a href='
https://onelink.to/xzqgtn'>BLR
Pulse App</a>.\n If you require any further assistance, please reach out to our customer care at <a href='mailto:feedback@bialairport.com'>feedback@bialairport.com</a> or call <a href='tel:08066785555'>080-66785555</a> / <a href='tel:08047406666'>080-47406666</a>.		https://coroverbackendstorage.blob.core.windows.net/chatbot-audio-bucket/c121c44c-8ac9-4d54-bcd4-54069b15e7c2_en.mp3
Wireless & Internet access for homeAvail free Wi-Fi service (upto 2 hours) at BLR Airport with a simple log-in process.<ol><li>Enable Wi-Fi and select BLR Airport free Wi-Fi.</li><li>Open a web browser on your device and type any URL. You will be redirected to the Wi-Fi webpage.</li><li>Fill in the required details and click on 'send OTP'</li><li>Enter the OTP received and click on 'submit'.</li><li>Enjoy free internet for 2 hours. Do not close the login page during this duration.</li>\nIf you are a registered user on pulse, then being a loyalty user you will be eligible for extended Wi-Fi.\nFor non pulse users, the Wi-Fi disables in an hour.
\nFor a more convenient experience, you may also download the <a href='
https://onelink.to/xzqgtn'>BLR
Pulse App</a>.\n If you require any further assistance, please reach out to our customer care at <a href='mailto:feedback@bialairport.com'>feedback@bialairport.com</a> or call <a href='tel:08066785555'>080-66785555</a> / <a href='tel:08047406666'>080-47406666</a>.		https://coroverbackendstorage.blob.core.windows.net/chatbot-audio-bucket/c121c44c-8ac9-4d54-bcd4-54069b15e7c2_en.mp3
Check-in procedure for domesticCarry your e-ticket or get your e-boarding pass at the self-check-in kiosks near departure gates.</li><li>Ensure that you have a valid government photo ID for security verification.</li><li>Proceed to the check-in counters to collect your boarding pass/drop luggage. Use self-bag drop, if applicable.</li><li>Show your e-boarding pass to CISF Personnel to pass-through security check.\nFor a more convenient experience, you may also download the <a href='https://onelink.to/xzqgtn'>BLR Pulse App</a>.\n If you require any further assistance, please reach out to our customer care at <a href='mailto:feedback@bialairport.com'>feedback@bialairport.com</a> or call <a href='tel:08066785555'>080-66785555</a> / <a href='tel:08047406666'>080-47406666</a>.https://coroverbackendstorage.blob.core.windows.net/chatbot-audio-bucket/4fb0745d-0be9-4328-9e47-6c8d898e1c7c_en.mp3
Procedure for domestic check-inCarry your e-ticket or get your e-boarding pass at the self-check-in kiosks near departure gates.</li><li>Ensure that you have a valid government photo ID for security verification.</li><li>Proceed to the check-in counters to collect your boarding pass/drop luggage. Use self-bag drop, if applicable.</li><li>Show your e-boarding pass to CISF Personnel to pass-through security check.\nFor a more convenient experience, you may also download the <a href='https://onelink.to/xzqgtn'>BLR Pulse App</a>.\n If you require any further assistance, please reach out to our customer care at <a href='mailto:feedback@bialairport.com'>feedback@bialairport.com</a> or call <a href='tel:08066785555'>080-66785555</a> / <a href='tel:08047406666'>080-47406666</a>.https://coroverbackendstorage.blob.core.windows.net/chatbot-audio-bucket/4fb0745d-0be9-4328-9e47-6c8d898e1c7c_en.mp3
The process of checking in for domesticCarry your e-ticket or get your e-boarding pass at the self-check-in kiosks near departure gates.</li><li>Ensure that you have a valid government photo ID for security verification.</li><li>Proceed to the check-in counters to collect your boarding pass/drop luggage. the process for domestic check-inCarry your e-ticket or get your e-boarding pass at the self-check-in kiosks near departure gates.</li><li>Ensure that you have a valid government photo ID for security verification.</li><li>Proceed to the check-in counters to collect your boarding pass/drop luggage. Check-in procedure for internationalCarry your e-ticket or get your boarding pass at the self-check-in kiosks near departure gates.</li><li>Ensure that you have a Passport and valid visa.</li><li>Proceed to the check-in counters to collect your boarding pass/drop luggage.</li><li>All passengers are required to clear Immigration and have their passports stamped during both arrival and departure.</li><li>Show your e-boarding pass to CISF Personnel to pass-through security check\nFor a more convenient experience, you may also download the <a href='https://onelink.to/xzqgtn'>BLR Pulse App</a>.\n If you require any further assistance, please reach out to our customer care at <a href='mailto:feedback@bialairport.com'>feedback@bialairport.com</a> or call <a href='tel:08066785555'>080-66785555</a> / <a href='tel:08047406666'>080-47406666</a>.https://coroverbackendstorage.blob.core.windows.net/chatbot-audio-bucket/4fb0745d-0be9-4328-9e47-6c8d898e1c7c_en.mp3
Procedure for international check-inCarry your e-ticket or get your boarding pass at the self-check-in kiosks near departure gates.</li><li>Ensure that you have a Passport and valid visa.</li><li>Proceed to the check-in counters to collect your boarding pass/drop luggage.</li><li>All passengers are required to clear Immigration and have their passports stamped during both arrival and departure.</li><li>Show your e-boarding pass to CISF Personnel to pass-through security check\nFor a more convenient experience, you may also download the <a href='https://onelink.to/xzqgtn'>BLR Pulse App</a>.\n If you require any further assistance, please reach out to our customer care at <a href='mailto:feedback@bialairport.com'>feedback@bialairport.com</a> or call <a href='tel:08066785555'>080-66785555</a> / <a href='tel:08047406666'>080-47406666</a>.https://coroverbackendstorage.blob.core.windows.net/chatbot-audio-bucket/4fb0745d-0be9-4328-9e47-6c8d898e1c7c_en.mp3

guidelines for international passengersAs per the GoI circular dated February 10, 2022, below are the revised international guidelines, effective February 14, 2022. BEFORE TRAVEL- Submit self-declaration form on Air Suvidha portal <a href = 'www.newdelhiairport.in' target='_blank'>www.newdelhiairport.in</a>, including travel details of last 14 days. Upload a negative COVID-19 RT-PCR report; test conducted within 72 hrs prior to the journey OR upload a certificate of completing full primary vaccination schedule of COVID-19 vaccination. The list of countries which have an agreement with India on mutual recognition of vaccination certificates are available on <a href = 'www.mohfw.gov.in.' target='_blank'>www.mohfw.gov.in.</a> Passengers must give an undertaking on the portal or otherwise to the MoCA (GoI) through the Airline that they would abide by the decisions of the appropriate Govt authorities to undergo self-health monitoring/quarantine, as warranted. ARRIVAL AT BLR AIRPORT-Undergo Thermal screening. Show the online self-declaration form to the Airport Health Officials. 2% of the passengers will undergo random testing at BLR Airport. Such passengers will be identified by the Airlines. They will submit swab samples and exit the airport. All international passengers arriving in Bengaluru must self-monitor their health for 14 days. If they develop any symptoms of COVID-19, they must self-isolate and inform the nearest health facility or call the National/State Helpline number. Children under 5 years are exempted from both pre and post arrival\nFor a more convenient experience, you may also download the <a href='https://onelink.to/xzqgtn'>BLR Pulse App</a>.\n If you require any further assistance, please reach out to our customer care at <a href='mailto:feedback@bialairport.com'>feedback@bialairport.com</a> or call <a href='tel:08066785555'>080-66785555</a> / <a href='tel:08047406666'>080-47406666</a>.https://coroverbackendstorage.blob.core.windows.net/chatbot-audio-bucket/26ff04a1-d25e-4c27-abd2-d2433e9d9134_en.mp3
recommendations for travelers from abroadAs per the GoI circular dated February 10, 2022, below are the revised international guidelines, effective February 14, 2022. BEFORE TRAVEL- Submit self-declaration form on Air Suvidha portal <a href = 'www.newdelhiairport.in' target='_blank'>www.newdelhiairport.in</a>, including travel details of last 14 days. Upload a negative COVID-19 RT-PCR report; test conducted within 72 hrs prior to the journey OR upload a certificate of completing full primary vaccination schedule of COVID-19 vaccination. The list of countries which have an agreement with India on mutual recognition of vaccination certificates are available on <a href = 'www.mohfw.gov.in.' target='_blank'>www.mohfw.gov.in.</a> Passengers must give an undertaking on the portal or otherwise to the MoCA (GoI) through the Airline that they would abide by the decisions of the appropriate Govt authorities to undergo self-health monitoring/quarantine, as warranted. ARRIVAL AT BLR AIRPORT-Undergo Thermal screening. Show the online self-declaration form to the Airport Health Officials. 2% of the passengers will undergo random testing at BLR Airport. Such passengers will be identified by the Airlines. They will submit swab samples and exit the airport. All international passengers arriving in Bengaluru must self-monitor their health for 14 days. If they develop any symptoms of COVID-19, they must self-isolate and inform the nearest health facility or call the National/State Helpline number. Children under 5 years are exempted from both pre and post arrival\nFor a more convenient experience, you may also download the <a href='https://onelink.to/xzqgtn'>BLR Pulse App</a>.\n If you require any further assistance, please reach out to our customer care at <a href='mailto:feedback@bialairport.com'>feedback@bialairport.com</a> or call <a href='tel:08066785555'>080-66785555</a> / <a href='tel:08047406666'>080-47406666</a>.https://coroverbackendstorage.blob.core.windows.net/chatbot-audio-bucket/26ff04a1-d25e-4c27-abd2-d2433e9d9134_en.mp3
rules for travelers from other countriesAs per the GoI circular dated February 10, 2022, below are the revised international guidelines, effective February 14, 2022. BEFORE TRAVEL- Submit self-declaration form on Air Suvidha portal <a href = 'www.newdelhiairport.in' target='_blank'>www.newdelhiairport.in</a>, including travel details of last 14 days. Upload a negative COVID-19 RT-PCR report; test conducted within 72 hrs prior to the journey OR upload a certificate of completing full primary vaccination schedule of COVID-19 vaccination. The list of countries which have an agreement with India on mutual recognition of vaccination certificates are available on <a href = 'www.mohfw.gov.in.' target='_blank'>www.mohfw.gov.in.</a> Passengers must give an undertaking on the portal or otherwise to the MoCA (GoI) through the Airline that they would abide by the decisions of the appropriate Govt authorities to undergo self-health monitoring/quarantine, as warranted. ARRIVAL AT BLR AIRPORT-Undergo Thermal screening. Show the online self-declaration form to the Airport Health Officials. 2% of the passengers will undergo random testing at BLR Airport. Such passengers will be identified by the Airlines. They will submit swab samples and exit the airport. All international passengers arriving in Bengaluru must self-monitor their health for 14 days. If they develop any symptoms of COVID-19, they must self-isolate and inform the nearest health facility or call the National/State Helpline number. Children under 5 years are exempted from both pre and post arrival\nFor a more convenient experience, you may also download the <a href='https://onelink.to/xzqgtn'>BLR Pulse App</a>.\n If you require any further assistance, please reach out to our customer care at <a href='mailto:feedback@bialairport.com'>feedback@bialairport.com</a> or call <a href='tel:08066785555'>080-66785555</a> / <a href='tel:08047406666'>080-47406666</a>.https://coroverbackendstorage.blob.core.windows.net/chatbot-audio-bucket/26ff04a1-d25e-4c27-abd2-d2433e9d9134_en.mp3
rules for travelers from overseasAs per the GoI circular dated February 10, 2022, below are the revised international guidelines, effective February 14, 2022. BEFORE TRAVEL- Submit self-declaration form on Air Suvidha portal <a href = 'www.newdelhiairport.in' target='_blank'>www.newdelhiairport.in</a>, including travel details of last 14 days. Upload a negative COVID-19 RT-PCR report; test conducted within 72 hrs prior to the journey OR upload a certificate of completing full primary vaccination schedule of COVID-19 vaccination. The list of countries which have an agreement with India on mutual recognition of vaccination certificates are available on <a href = 'www.mohfw.gov.in.' target='_blank'>www.mohfw.gov.in.</a> Passengers must give an undertaking on the portal or otherwise to the MoCA (GoI) through the Airline that they would abide by the decisions of the appropriate Govt authorities to undergo self-health monitoring/quarantine, as warranted. ARRIVAL AT BLR AIRPORT-Undergo Thermal screening. Show the online self-declaration form to the Airport Health Officials. 2% of the passengers will undergo random testing at BLR Airport. Such passengers will be identified by the Airlines. They will submit swab samples and exit the airport. All international passengers arriving in Bengaluru must self-monitor their health for 14 days. If they develop any symptoms of COVID-19, they must self-isolate and inform the nearest health facility or call the National/State Helpline number. Baggage WrappingOur Care by BLR- Experience Counter offers Baggage wrapping service to the passengers departing from Kempegowda International Airport, Bangaluru. Secure all your essential baggage by using our Baggage Wrapping services to shield against scratches, bumps, tampering and bad weather. Your Luggage is wrapped in a clear white environment friendly plastic film wrap which acts as a protective layer, securing and preventing the goods being damaged. What is the duration to access the lounge?Passengers may enter the lounge only three hours before departure time and are permitted to spend three hours on a single transaction. How to avail lounge facility at BLR Airport for domestic Departures?Hello, the domestic BLR lounge is located inside the terminal building after the security check, managed by TFS(Travel and Food Services). Where do I wait for the complimentary shuttle service between T1 and T2?At T1, complimentary shuttle services are available from two points. The inner VIP lane at T1 Departure Zone next to Relay outlet T1 kerbside (near Arrivals) before Aster Clinic At T2, complimentary shuttle services are available from pick-up points P16 / P17 at the Arrivals Zone. There are prominent signages in these areas. I have booked a connecting flight via BLR Airport. How do I check if I have to go to a different terminal?Kindly check your airline ticket or web check-in document for details on the terminal number. Customers can contact BLR Airport at 8884998888 (WhatsApp only) and 80-22012001. Download the BLR Pulse App for flight schedules, estimated queue wait times and more.\nFor a more convenient experience, you may also download the <a href='https://onelink.to/xzqgtn'>BLR Pulse App</a>.\n If you require any further assistance, please reach out to our customer care at <a href='mailto:feedback@bialairport.com'>feedback@bialairport.com</a> or call <a href='tel:08066785555'>080-66785555</a> / <a href='tel:08047406666'>080-47406666</a>.https://coroverbackendstorage.blob.core.windows.net/chatbot-audio-bucket/b7cfe7c8-e35b-43ab-8e84-90dc8bf60d1a_en.mp3

Self check-inSelf-check-in kiosks are located at the Kerb, near Departure Gate #1. <br>The passenger must scan the barcode on the ticket, select a seat and retrieve the e-boarding pass.\nFor a more convenient experience, you may also download the <a href='https://onelink.to/xzqgtn'>BLR Pulse App</a>.\n If you require any further assistance, please reach out to our customer care at <a href='mailto:feedback@bialairport.com'>feedback@bialairport.com</a> or call <a href='tel:08066785555'>080-66785555</a> / <a href='tel:08047406666'>080-47406666</a>.https://coroverbackendstorage.blob.core.windows.net/chatbot-audio-bucket/11f519ae-4c5b-41ec-8690-307d7ea0e4e0_en.mp3

Can I park my Four wheelers at BLR Airport? If yes, what are the charges?Yes, we have an overnight parking facility; for four-wheelers, it will be INR 600 for the first day (24hrs) and every additional day INR 350 (24hrs). Where do I wait for the complimentary shuttle service between T1 and T2?At T1, complimentary shuttle services are available from two points. The inner VIP lane at T1 Departure Zone next to Relay outlet T1 kerbside (near Arrivals) before Aster Clinic At T2, complimentary shuttle services are available from pick-up points P16 / P17 at the Arrivals Zone. There are prominent signages in these areas. Please follow them or contact our ground staff.\nFor a more convenient experience, you may also download the <a href='https://onelink.to/xzqgtn'>BLR Pulse App</a>.\n If you require any further assistance, please reach out to our customer care at <a href='mailto:feedback@bialairport.com'>feedback@bialairport.com</a> or call <a href='tel:08066785555'>080-66785555</a> / <a href='tel:08047406666'>080-47406666</a>.https://storage.corover.ai/chatbot-audio-bucket-aws/4b15cba3-4a5f-4e92-8b39-6d508cca4d18_en.mp3

Do you offer special services for differently abled passengers?For differently abled passengers, a dedicated zone is reserved for drop-off at the Kerb near the Departure gates and pick up at the inner Kerb near Arrivals. A calling facility has been installed at the drop-off point to enable passengers to call the airline for assistance. Differently abled passengers are accorded priority at all processing points (departure gates, check-in counters, PESC and boarding gates). Passengers with reduced mobility can opt for the complimentary buggy service available at two designated locations: near Departure gates and at International security check area. Passengers can also engage a concierge and porter service. They will be assisted by staff and escorted by the porter to the check-in counter.\nFor a more convenient experience, you may also download the <a href='https://onelink.to/xzqgtn'>BLR Pulse App</a>.\n If you require any further assistance, please reach out to our customer care at <a href='mailto:feedback@bialairport.com'>feedback@bialairport.com</a> or call <a href='tel:08066785555'>080-66785555</a> / <a href='tel:08047406666'>080-47406666</a>.https://storage.corover.ai/chatbot-audio-bucket-aws/0b8216bc-503f-439d-8878-8922e6a191dc_en.mp3

Is road transport available to commute to and from T2?The following modes of transport are available from T2: Airport Taxis BLuSmart, OLA and Uber BMTC buses* KSRTC buses** Private cars **KSRTC - Drop-off and pick-up are from the existing BMTC / KSRTC Zone at T1. **BMTC - Drop-off and pick-up are from Lane 2 at the Arrivals Zone in T2. Complimentary shuttle services are available to commute between T1 and T2.\nFor a more convenient experience, you may also download the <a href='https://onelink.to/xzqgtn'>BLR Pulse App</a>.\n If you require any further assistance, please reach out to our customer care at <a href='mailto:feedback@bialairport.com'>feedback@bialairport.com</a> or call <a href='tel:08066785555'>080-66785555</a> / <a href='tel:08047406666'>080-47406666</a>.https://storage.corover.ai/chatbot-audio-bucket-aws/f4cd4f9c-eca0-45c5-93e2-24b40b2366e9_en.mp3
Is it possible to commute to and from T2 by car?The following modes of transport are available from T2: Airport Taxis BLuSmart, OLA and Uber BMTC buses* KSRTC buses** Private cars **KSRTC - Drop-off and pick-up are from the existing BMTC / KSRTC Zone at T1. **BMTC - Drop-off and pick-up are from Lane 2 at the Arrivals Zone in T2. Complimentary shuttle services are available to commute between T1 and T2.\nFor a more convenient experience, you may also download the <a href='https://onelink.to/xzqgtn'>BLR Pulse App</a>.\n If you require any further assistance, please reach out to our customer care at <a href='mailto:feedback@bialairport.com'>feedback@bialairport.com</a> or call <a href='tel:08066785555'>080-66785555</a> / <a href='tel:08047406666'>080-47406666</a>.https://storage.corover.ai/chatbot-audio-bucket-aws/f4cd4f9c-eca0-45c5-93e2-24b40b2366e9_en.mp3

What is the process to transfer to a different terminal at BLR Airport?To transfer to a different terminal, complimentary inter terminal shuttle service is available every 10 minutes. Pickup Point at T1 The inner VIP lane at the Departure Zone next to Relay outlet T1 kerbside (near Arrivals) before Aster Clinic Pickup Point at T2 P16 / P17 at the Arrivals level Please contact our team for assistance. For information on Transfers please click here.\nFor a more convenient experience, you may also download the <a href='https://onelink.to/xzqgtn'>BLR Pulse App</a>.\n If you require any further assistance, please reach out to our customer care at <a href='mailto:feedback@bialairport.com'>feedback@bialairport.com</a> or call <a href='tel:08066785555'>080-66785555</a> / <a href='tel:08047406666'>080-47406666</a>.https://storage.corover.ai/chatbot-audio-bucket-aws/b51668d3-868c-4c64-912b-e6f4501d1129_en.mp3

How do I reach the other terminal, if I have reported at the wrong one?To transfer to a different terminal, complimentary inter terminal shuttle service is available every 10 minutes. Please contact ground staff for assistance. How can international passengers access Wi-Fi without a roaming/local sim cards?International passengers who do not have a roaming/local sim card use the free Wi-Fi service at contactless Wi-Fi coupon dispensing kiosks placed at International arrivals.

Scan the photo page of your passport.

Scan your boarding pass.

Accept terms & conditions.

Collect your Wi-Fi voucher code.

Is the parking facility manual or automated?The automated parking facility for passengers with self-driven cars is entirely contactless from entry to exit. Once the car arrives at the parking gate, the ticket machine dispenses a ticket, capturing the time, date. At the exit, the passenger needs to scan the ticket against a machine, and payment can be made using a digital platform. In case of card payment, the card will be sanitised before returning it to the customer.\nFor a more convenient experience, you may also download the <a href='https://onelink.to/xzqgtn'>BLR Pulse App</a>.\n If you require any further assistance, please reach out to our customer care at <a href='mailto:feedback@bialairport.com'>feedback@bialairport.com</a> or call <a href='tel:08066785555'>080-66785555</a> / <a href='tel:08047406666'>080-47406666</a>.https://coroverbackendstorage.blob.core.windows.net/chatbot-audio-bucket/3c4d2c07-d301-4da4-a6dd-dfb03a74f0e0_en.mp3

can I book Ola?www.bengaluruairport.com \nTo book the city to airport or vice-versa cabs please download the pulse app from BLR Pulse App and look for cab booking option at the bottom of page and finish your cab booking in a few clicks. \nWish you a pleasant ride!" id="sjs-B719">Yes! There is a pre-paid cab booking option through the pulse app for both Bangalore city to airport and vice-versa. Currently WTi cabs to bring you this service, and more providers are going to join this service soon. You can avail a cab from airport with minimal wait time and right outside the arrival counter without having to go through the hassle of long wait times, cancellations and surge pricing. For booking cabs from city a minimum 150 min lead time is required for the cab to be available at your doorstep. You can read more about the cabs in the transport section of the website: <a href="https://www.bengaluruairport.com/travellers/transport-parking#CarRentals" target="_blank">www.bengaluruairport.com</a>

Currently WTi cabs to bring you this service, and more providers are going to join this service soon. You can avail a cab from airport with minimal wait time and right outside the arrival counter without having to go through the hassle of long wait times, cancellations and surge pricing. For booking cabs from city a minimum 150 min lead time is required for the cab to be available at your doorstep. You can read more about the cabs in the transport section of the website: <a href="https://www.bengaluruairport.com/travellers/transport-parking#CarRentals" target="_blank">www.bengaluruairport.com</a>

\nTo book the city to airport or vice-versa cabs please download the pulse app from <a href="https://onelink.to/xzqgtn" target="_blank">BLR Pulse App</a> and look for cab booking option at the bottom of page and finish your cab booking in a few clicks.

Can I search and track flights arriving or departing at Bangalore airport?www.bengaluruairport.com page. From here you can search flights by typing the flight number, location or location code. You can also track your flights of interest if you wish to do so. \n Also you can download the pulse app from :- BLR Pulse App and look for more options. Happy browsing!" id="sjs-B788">Yes, pulse platform allows you to search for flights by visiting the : <a href="https://www.bengaluruairport.com/travellers/flights/flight-information" target="_blank">www.bengaluruairport.com</a> page. From here you can search flights by typing the flight number, location or location code. You can also track your flights of interest if you wish to do so.
\n Also you can download the pulse app from :- <a href="https://onelink.to/xzqgtn" target="_blank">BLR Pulse App</a> and look for more options.

What is the estimated queue waiting time feature on pulse?www.bengaluruairport.com. \nAlso you can download the pulse app from :- BLR Pulse App and look for more options. Safe travels!" id="sjs-B806">Yes, pulse platform allows you to find out the estimated queue times by giving approximate timings of terminal entrance gates, check-in counters and security check queues. With this you can estimate the rough amount of time taken to reach your plane. It also has an indicator to showcase whether the queues at various ares are moving fast or slow. \nTo check this feature please visit: <a href="https://www.bengaluruairport.com/travellers/at-the-airport/estimatedWaitTime" target="_blank">www.bengaluruairport.com</a>. \nAlso you can download the pulse app from :- <a href="https://onelink.to/xzqgtn" target="_blank">BLR Pulse App</a> and look for more options.

Safe travels!" id="sjs-B815">Yes, pulse platform allows you to find out the estimated queue times by giving approximate timings of terminal entrance gates, check-in counters and security check queues. With this you can estimate the rough amount of time taken to reach your plane. It also has an indicator to showcase whether the queues at various ares are moving fast or slow. \nTo check this feature please visit: <a href="https://www.bengaluruairport.com/travellers/at-the-airport/estimatedWaitTime" target="_blank">www.bengaluruairport.com</a>
. \nAlso you can download the pulse app from :- <a href="https://onelink.to/xzqgtn" target="_blank">BLR Pulse App</a> and look for more options.

How can i access wifi at bengaluru airport?Avail free Wi-Fi service (upto 2 hours) at BLR Airport with a simple log-in process.<ol><li>Enable Wi-Fi and select BLR Airport free Wi-Fi.</li><li>Open a web browser on your device and type any URL. You will be redirected to the Wi-Fi webpage.</li><li>Fill in the required details and click on 'send OTP'</li><li>Enter the OTP received and click on 'submit'.</li><li>Enjoy free internet for 2 hours. Do not close the login page during this duration.</li>\nIf you are a registered user on pulse, then being a loyalty user you will be eligible for extended Wi-Fi.\nFor non pulse users, the Wi-Fi disables in an hour.
\nFor a more convenient experience, you may also download the <a href='
https://onelink.to/xzqgtn'>BLR
Pulse App</a>.\n If you require any further assistance, please reach out to our customer care at <a href='mailto:feedback@bialairport.com'>feedback@bialairport.com</a> or call <a href='tel:08066785555'>080-66785555</a> / <a href='tel:08047406666'>080-47406666</a>.		https://coroverbackendstorage.blob.core.windows.net/chatbot-audio-bucket/c121c44c-8ac9-4d54-bcd4-54069b15e7c2_en.mp3
